name: Legit YouTube Simulator
description:
A totally real YouTube Simulator made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

In this legit game, you accurately run a YouTube channel and grow it effectively by totally not buying likes and subscribers.

--Credits--

Programming: Charcool - Charcool's YouTube

Music and SFX: The Captain Moo - The Captain Moo's YouTube

Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 - https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-7
